programme.title: Being There at the End
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S2 - "Being There at the End"
programme.desc: In this episode, we discover that spirit and tactics for real endurance teams become vital in order to claim victory at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa.

programme.title: Salvage Gone Awry
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Salvage Gone Awry"
programme.desc: Joel and Mark Barker tempt fate and fly into no mans land to find and salvage a white airplane in a snowy forest, and fight hypothermia along the way.

programme.title: Heaven at 5,000 Feet
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Heaven at 5,000 Feet"
programme.desc: Pilot Josiah Freeman takes a professional snowboarder Mark Barajas to the top of the Chugach Mountains for some hellacious heli-skiing.

programme.title: Gran Canaria - Part One
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Hunting Fish S1 - "Gran Canaria - Part One"
programme.desc: Thom hunt challenges himself to locate a rare Mirror Carp in stunning Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Gran Canaria - Part Two
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Hunting Fish S1 - "Gran Canaria - Part Two"
programme.desc: Thom hunt challenges himself to fish wild Tuna in stunning Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Alpine Ghosts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Alpine Ghosts"
programme.desc: Mario takes on the unforgiving alpine mountains of the South Island of New Zealand in a grueling fallow deer hunt with his bow just at the end of the rut and cooks an impressive masterpiece venison pie dish on the same antler of the deer he harvests.

programme.title: Deadly Outback
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Man Eats Wild S1 - "Deadly Outback"
programme.desc: We are in the outback of Australia. It’s the Monsoon season. Mario links up with longtime friend in search of a wild Buffalo, he attempts to cook an amazing South American inspired dish in the middle of nowhere.

programme.title: The Lateral Line
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Buccaneers and Bones S1 - "The Lateral Line"
programme.desc: Old friends Michael Keaton and Tom McGuane share a boat together, which means there will be plenty of action and plenty of laughts. Bonefish and Tarpon Trusts Aaron Adams helps Zach Gilford dance with a tarpon for the first time.

programme.title: FMX Nomads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FMX Nomads S1 - "FMX Nomads"
programme.desc: Join Dan Whitby, Samson Eaton and Arran Powley for a day in the life of globetrotting freestyle motocross team, Bolddog.

programme.title: Frozen Fire
programme.desc: When a report of an illegal buck surfaces Warden Joe Kambic goes to work to find the shooters. Things heat up for Warden Rick Smauch when he responds to a fire, and Bryan Golie fights the winter weather just to patrol his area.

programme.title: River Rescue
programme.desc: Drownings happen every Summer on Montanas rivers and lakes. Region 1 Warden Chris Crane steps in to save a kayaker while Region 2 Wardens catch friends fishing in the wrong spot.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: Something is killing deer in the Missoula Valley and it has FWP working overtime to find the culprit.

programme.title: Return Home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Return Home"
programme.desc: Caseys bull speeds downstream, out of sight. Anticipation rises as they round the bend. Chris spots it washed up near white water on a gravel flat.

programme.title: Hell has a Name
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Hell has a Name"
programme.desc: The journeys to Base Camp and to sheep camp are highlighted.

programme.title: Horses Can Think... Rafts Cant
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Horses Can Think... Rafts Cant"
programme.desc: Episode two begins where one left off, with Casey facing a decision. Positioned precariously on the mountain, they realize the ram theyre chasing isnt legal, forcing them to retreat.

programme.title: Surviving a Bear Attack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving a Bear Attack"
programme.desc: Nick and Laura create kick-ass tests to explore the immense power and startling speed of grizzly bears. They use Hollywood stunt tools to experience an attack. Then try to recreate a “miracle” arrow shot that saved a man from being killed by a bear.

programme.title: Surviving Treestand Accidents
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving Treestand Accidents"
programme.desc: In this exciting episode we’ll find out the reasons why tree stand accidents happen and how we can prevent them. Cool science mixed with dynamic experiments send our hosts, our stunt team and our special crash test dummies plummeting to the ground.

programme.title: Sniper Attack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Survival Science S1 - "Sniper Attack"
programme.desc: Military snipers are trained in a variety of skills: detection, stalking, camouflage, infiltration, special reconnaissance and target acquisition. Bottom line, a ton of cool shooting and science for Nick and Laura to explore!

programme.title: Day Three Begins
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Three Begins"
programme.desc: Day three ends at Hurricane Hole Marina in Key West, Florida, on the Madfin Shark Series and there can bo only one Madfin Shark Champion.

programme.title: Yellowfin Mission
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Yellowfin Mission"
programme.desc: Words gotten out about some massive yellowfin baitballs, so the team head out in search of more tuna glory. Dwane, Kieran, Sam and Dave then bounce over the ditch for a few days diving the stunning waters of the Great Barrier Reef.

programme.title: Lucinda Sky with Diamonds
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Lucinda Sky with Diamonds"
programme.desc: The lads try their luck at getting a spear into one of the quintessential Australian fish species - the barramundi. Problem is, these barra inhabit the same waters as a couple of other less welcome locals - saltwater crocodiles and bull sharks!

programme.title: Just Another Fijian
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Just Another Fijian"
programme.desc: Dwane and Jools are joined by their pint sized proteges this week, as 12-year-olds Eli and Reef tag along on the adventure with the old men on a mission to explore the far flung waters of North Eastern Fiji.

programme.title: Alaska
programme.desc: We follow one of the best MTB riders and trail-builders on the planet during a trip in Alaska, one of the most remote and wild places in the world.

programme.title: Brazil
programme.desc: The World’s best Brazilian rider opens the doors to his house to show how it all started and brings us to Mexico for the most famous urban race in the world.

programme.title: Argentina
programme.desc: Two talented Canadian brothers and pro MTB riders decide to go on a freeride trip together and choose to explore the remote desert of Argentina.

programme.title: Morgan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Morgan"
programme.desc: Mat’s demanding client Gordon is in search of a Morgan, but will he be able to find the ideal car for the right price?

programme.title: Citroen DS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Citroen DS"
programme.desc: Mat goes in search of a perfect Citroen DS for Leon, a man who has strong connections to the DS, and to France.

programme.title: Mini
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Mini"
programme.desc: Mat Watson travels Europe on the trail of a very special 1960s Mini.

programme.title: Marrakech
programme.desc: Cody is in Marrakech, Morocco, for a local exploring adventure on BMX-bikes through an old medina, along graffiti walls, night markets and a forbidden hotel.

programme.title: Berlin
programme.desc: Historical Berlin offers Josh two days of adventures and hidden treasures including a former U.S. Spy Station used during the Cold War and an abandoned garage.

programme.title: Tbilisi
programme.desc: Cody discovers the unknown beauty of Tbilisi exploring abandoned Cold War bomb shelters, a derelict weather station and an abandoned cable car station.

programme.title: Saving Private Terry
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S3 - "Saving Private Terry"
programme.desc: Terry gets to relive part of his military carrier by attempting the famous sniper shot from Saving Private Ryan, and Larry and Terry demonstrate how sniper technology has developed over the years and test some amazing sniper shots.

programme.title: The Last Crusade of Indiana Terry
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S4 - "The Last Crusade of Indiana Terry"
programme.desc: Terry channels his inner Dr. Jones and tests 1 scene from Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade containing 3 different tests, two of which they will need a tank for. The duo will travel down to Uvalde, TX to visit Drivetanks.com to see if a tank round will topple over a car, and if a 9mm round can travel through three Germans.

programme.title: Equalizing Terry
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Hollywood Weapons: Fact or Fiction? S4 - "Equalizing Terry"
programme.desc: Terry and Larry will test 3 scenes from Denzel Washington’s Equalizer films. Can Terry be as cool as Denzel and use propane tanks and a microwave to create an explosion, use a staple gun to take out the bad guy, or create a scenario where a flash bang will ignite a room full of baking flour?

programme.title: Best of ep. 7 to 11
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Running the World S1 - "Best of ep. 7 to 11"
programme.desc: In this episode the boys look back over their time spent in Portugal India Mexico Gran Canaria and Jamaica.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Jamie puts his trust in new explosives technology.

programme.title: Episode 7
programme.desc: A young snowmobilers first ride into the backcountry spins out of control.

programme.title: Episode 8
programme.desc: Tim demands a lot of everyone around him, especially during a cave rescue - what he describes as "the worst kind of rescue possible".

programme.title: Japan, Part II
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Travel Bug S1 - "Japan, Part II"
programme.desc: Tokyo is one of the must visit cities of the world. It epitomises urban excess and is a sprawling metropolis that never shuts down. We explore some of the quirkiest parts of the city to explore the people, technology and culture.

programme.title: Record Day - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Record Day - Part 1"
programme.desc: The transformation is complete and it’s time for The Flying Kestrel to be put to the test.

programme.title: Record Day - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Record Day - Part 2"
programme.desc: The Flying Kestrel takes on the final records attempts, and the shocking results leave everyone reeling.

programme.title: Pinky
programme.desc: A pink, air-cooled, 1973 Porsche 911 RS is upgraded with a custom built engine, new paint, and new wheels and tires.

programme.title: Benzilla
programme.desc: A slow and outdated 1959 Mercedes Benz 180 D is modified with a bargain budget to include new wheels and an American V8 muscle motor.

programme.title: Episode Three
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Three"
programme.desc: Nik unveils the bold Cadillac Escalade, while Mike praises the redesigned Nissan Rogue. Nik shares Alfa Romeos rich 110-year legacy, then cruises in the Lexus LC500 with the top down.

programme.title: Episode Four
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Four"
programme.desc: Nik tests the 2021 Toyota Land Cruiser. Mike explores the 2021 Kia Telluride. Nik showcases the 2021 Hyundai N Line. Witness Mercedes Benz AMGs pinnacle creation. Niks blown away by the new Kia K5.

programme.title: Through the Night
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S3 - "Through the Night"
programme.desc: The 24 Hours of Spa is a notoriously difficult race. For Andy Soucek, Albert Costa and Lewis Williamson, making it through night presents a tough challenge.

programme.title: Season Recap
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Fight to Survive S1 - "Season Recap"
programme.desc: This week, we take a look back at our seasons survival stories with a more in-depth look with the help of former Army Special Forces soldier, Terry Schappert.

programme.title: The Crash
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "The Crash"
programme.desc: After driver Jon Webster crashes the Flying Kestrel at 148 mph, the team must work out what went wrong and have to decide if the dream of a land speed record is worth risking it all?

programme.title: New Year In The Emergency Room
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Emergency S1 - "New Year In The Emergency Room"
programme.desc: Tet, the Vietnamese New Year, is pivotal in Vietnam. Yet, for paramedics, its a bustling time. Similarly, in Sydney, New Years is famous, but New South Wales Ambulance paramedics have little time for festivities.

programme.title: TOWNSHIP POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Police Patrol S1 - "TOWNSHIP POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: Rio de Janeiro’s beaches draw tourists, but beyond the picture postcard imagery lies a harsher reality—favelas ruled by drug gangs. To reclaim these areas, the government deployed BOPE, an elite police force taking the fight to the streets since 2008.

programme.title: A Fly in the Ointment
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 Graveyard Carz S6 - "A Fly in the Ointment"
programme.desc: Mark and Royal go on a fieldtrip. Will removes a fly from the Phantom Cuda’s paint and Alyssa gets a lesson on a paint booth technique.

programme.title: Will Gets Grumpy
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 Graveyard Carz S6 - "Will Gets Grumpy"
programme.desc: Dave brings in his own engine to test run. The Ghouls fine tune Torino’s GTX and Mark and Alyssa meet a client with a special car.

programme.title: Hanging by a Thread
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Hanging by a Thread"
programme.desc: Tanalian Aviation bush pilots Joel and Josiah earn their keep slinging a stranded snow machine.

programme.title: FMX Nomads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FMX Nomads S1 - "FMX Nomads"
programme.desc: Join Dan Whitby, Samson Eaton and Arran Powley for a day in the life of globetrotting freestyle motocross team, Bolddog.

programme.title: Slums
programme.desc: Since 1991, Mumbai’s population has doubled, with over half living in slums. Buenos Aires faces similar struggles, where 7.6% reside in shantytowns. Paramedics often can’t reach these areas and must rely on local volunteers.

programme.title: NARCOTRAFFIC POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Police Patrol S1 - "NARCOTRAFFIC POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: As one of the world’s top cocaine producers, Peru is a magnet for global drug cartels. To combat the trade at its source, the elite anti-narcotics unit Sinchi was formed—taking the fight deep into the heart of production zones.

programme.title: Careless Endeavors
programme.desc: Opening weekend mayhem has wardens running from one call to the next. But not all violations are negligence.

programme.title: Grey Ghost
programme.desc: Wardens get a tip about grey pickup shooting a deer at night; but even joining forces they have a tough time tracking down the Grey Ghost.

programme.title: Dump Site
programme.desc: Region 4 Wardens find a deer in the dumpster, multiple deer dumped along side the road and a deer left by a trespasser. Its all in a long days work!

programme.title: Band of Ten
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Band of Ten"
programme.desc: In episode three, the crew encounters a canyon with ten rams, sparking initial excitement. However, the subsequent desappointment sets in as none of the rams meet the legal criteria.

programme.title: Now or Never
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Now or Never"
programme.desc: As the fog passes on the peak of Fish Hooks rocky face, the outline of the crew appears exactly where the ram was bedded last. Did they shoot and Chris not hear the shot?

programme.title: Saddles Sores
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Saddles Sores"
programme.desc: Leaving sheep country on a high, the men face a daunting 22-hour trail ride to Tom-Tom, the first moose camp. Two days of riding loom a head before reaching their destination. However, trouble strikes just eight hours into the journey.

programme.title: White Death
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Trail S1 - "White Death"
programme.desc: Snow, what the mountain men called white death, stops Laramy in his tracks. In addition, his trusty horse Seven has suffered a leg injury. Laramy must take care of Seven, battle through hunger, and survive the snowfall.

programme.title: The Struggle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Trail S1 - "The Struggle"
programme.desc: Laramy remains stuck at Camp Hell Hole, nursing 7s leg, and struggling to survive in the freezing temperatures without food.

programme.title: On the Move
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Trail S1 - "On the Move"
programme.desc: Laramy and 7 leave camp Hell Hole and hit the trail again. They are headed for lower elevation in search of a more permanent place to call home.

programme.title: The End?
programme.desc: In the exciting season finale, Chris lays it all on the line one last time while bear hunting. Casey must finish one final task to make the fruits of their labor worthwhile. As the brothers inch closer to safety, they wonder what the future holds.

programme.title: Slums
programme.desc: Since 1991, Mumbai’s population has doubled, with over half living in slums. Buenos Aires faces similar struggles, where 7.6% reside in shantytowns. Paramedics often can’t reach these areas and must rely on local volunteers.

programme.title: NARCOTRAFFIC POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Police Patrol S1 - "NARCOTRAFFIC POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: As one of the world’s top cocaine producers, Peru is a magnet for global drug cartels. To combat the trade at its source, the elite anti-narcotics unit Sinchi was formed—taking the fight deep into the heart of production zones.

programme.title: South Africa
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 MTB Heroes S3 - "South Africa"
programme.desc: We follow the fastest and most stylish female MTB pro rider in the world during a trip to South Africa where she will ride the best trails around Cape Town.

programme.title: Morocco
programme.desc: A German MTB legend decides to build a van and travel all the way down to Morocco to explore and ride the great Atlas mountains.

programme.title: Spain
programme.desc: We meet with a Spanish MTB pro rider who decided to create his own company in order to build the most exclusive and unique carbon bikes.

programme.title: Mercedes SL
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Mercedes SL"
programme.desc: Mat Watson tracks down one of the most desirable convertibles on the planet. The Mercedes SL Pagoda.

programme.title: American Car
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Find Me A Classic S1 - "American Car"
programme.desc: Mat Watson sets off to seek out a slice of Americana. A classic car from the USA.

programme.title: New York
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "New York"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie hits New York City in a four million dollar rare Lamborghini Centenario. Her quest is to track down the players in the underground drift driving scene and visit the exclusive Manhattan Motor Club.

programme.title: Day 1
programme.desc: Kevin travels to Switzerland and has 24 hours to go from Zurich to the Swiss mountains, while Jalou finds an exciting way to go from Cannes to Corsica.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 A Simple Path S3 - "Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Yann explores Los Angeles, visiting Kingswell Skate Shop, meeting DJ Chavez and Norman Woods. He encounters DiOrr Greenwoods artistic skateboards, Hali Stradas fashion and Chandler Burtons unique project merging drag, puppets and skating.

programme.title: Turmeric
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Turmeric"
programme.desc: Journey alongside Lauren as she delves into the vibrant world of turmeric. From infusing it into dishes like Urap Pakis to crafting a healthful elixir called Jamu, discover the captivating flavors against the breathtaking backdrop of Mount Agung.

programme.title: Nut
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Nut"
programme.desc: Join Lauren on a culinary adventure with various nuts as she discovers their potential beyond snacking and incorporates them into Italian and Balinese recipes like Cashew cheese, mouthwatering Cabonara and more delightful flavors.

programme.title: Gran Canaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Running the World S1 - "Gran Canaria"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave are challenged to create a run through an abandoned water park on the island of Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Jamaica
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Running the World S1 - "Jamaica"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave are challenged to create a unique run in an unusal setting on the Island of Jamaica.

programme.title: The Tropic Cape
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Africa From Cape to Kruger S1 - "The Tropic Cape"
programme.desc: Stage four of his journey takes Andreas Keiling from ocean to mountain, from swamp to sand dune, as he makes his way to a spectacular Lakeland water park. His day starts with a nerve wracking dip in the ocean to swim with a school of

programme.title: The Cape Bush
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Africa From Cape to Kruger S1 - "The Cape Bush"
programme.desc: During the final stage of his journey, Andreas visits the legendary Kruger National Park, hoping for a close encounter with South Africa’s legendary predators. Under the watchful eye of an experienced bushman he tracks a herd of Cape buffalo.

programme.title: Bordeaux, France Wine and History
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Travels with Darley S1 - "Bordeaux, France Wine and History"
programme.desc: Darley Newman shares how to get the most out of your visit to France’s renowned wine region, including archaeological marvels, historic landmarks, cultural treasures—and multiple winetastings.

programme.title: Bordeaux, France Markets and Villages
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Travels with Darley S1 - "Bordeaux, France Markets and Villages"
programme.desc: World-class wine, medieval villages, museums and markets, the Bordeaux region of France is truly a feast for the senses. Darley cruises rivers and explore villages to reveal history around every scenic turn.

programme.title: True Power in the Hidden Valley of the Flowers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Road to Dharma S1 - "True Power in the Hidden Valley of the Flowers"
programme.desc: Before Riding to the Hidden Valley of the Flowers, we get a rare view of the hidden life of the riders in this “real world of yogis” opening scene.

programme.title: Sweet After Bitter
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Sweet Planet S1 - "Sweet After Bitter"
programme.desc: From Teochew sweetrice cakes in China, sugarcane in India, to chocolate in Ivory Coast, this episode tells the story of how humans pursue and obtain sweetness, and how sweetness provides comfort and warmth to humanity.

programme.title: Kunming
programme.desc: Join host Tianran He in Kunming, the capital of Yunnan province in southwest China. Named the Spring City for its perennially good weather, Kunming is one of Chinas most ethnically diverse cities, something thats reflected in its food.

programme.title: The Taste of Home
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Foodwise S2 - "The Taste of Home"
programme.desc: Eva rediscovers her love for a classic century-old dish in her hometown Vienna. Meanwhile, Beijings charming autumn season sets Tianran back in time as he rediscovers flavors from his childhood.

programme.title: Shaoxing
programme.desc: Join host Tianran He in the historic water town of Shaoxing, famed for its yellow wine. Traversing its canals by boat, Tianran discovers why its said there are 10,000 bridges in Shaoxing.

programme.title: Serbia Part 1
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Maximum Foodie S4 - "Serbia Part 1"
programme.desc: Sashi starts the new season by heading to Europe, but not to a mainstream location; he heads to the Balkans to learn about Serbian cuisine and hospitality. From fish soups by the river, to making ajvar in the countryside, and plenty of rakia in between, Sashi hooks up with Belgrade’s Best chef and herbalist to learn about everything from traditional kafana culture to haute cuisine.

programme.title: Serbia Part 2
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Maximum Foodie S4 - "Serbia Part 2"
programme.desc: Sashi starts the new season by heading to Europe, but not to a mainstream location; he heads to the Balkans to learn about Serbian cuisine and hospitality. From fish soups by the river, to making ajvar in the countryside, and plenty of rakia in between, Sashi hooks up with Belgrade’s Best chef and herbalist to learn about everything from traditional kafana culture to haute cuisine.

programme.title: Frederic Molina – Moulin de Lere
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Taste of France S1 - "Frederic Molina – Moulin de Lere"
programme.desc: At the feet of the Jura mountains,”close to nature” chef Fredric Molina built up an ideal family restaurant and earned his first Michelin star. Let’s explore the secrets to his delicious food, his way of building a power team and how he finds harmony

programme.title: Rene and Maxime Meilleur – La Bouitte
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Taste of France S1 - "Rene and Maxime Meilleur – La Bouitte"
programme.desc: In this program we’ll get acquainted with the unique story of self-taught Rene and Maxime Meilleur, father and son running a three-star Michelin restaurant in Saint-Martin-de-Belleville in the Savoy region.

programme.title: Alexandre Mazzia – AM
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Taste of France S1 - "Alexandre Mazzia – AM"
programme.desc: In this program we’ll meet two Michelin star chef, Alexandre Mazzia at his highly acclaimed restaurant in Marseilles. His daily challenge is not lack of inspiration, but to filter the massive influx of ideas that runs through his head.

programme.title: Eric Trochon – Solstice
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Taste of France S1 - "Eric Trochon – Solstice"
programme.desc: Today we’ll visit the wonderful city of Paris and the restaurant of Eric Trochon - Solstice - an informal yet elegant restaurant awarded with a Michelin star.

programme.title: Sweetness in Nature
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Sweet Planet S1 - "Sweetness in Nature"
programme.desc: This episode demonstrates the diversity and complexity of sweetness and also shows us that nature itself is the greatest brewer, reminding us to return to nature and enjoy the pure sweetness in life.

programme.title: Sweetness in the Family
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Sweet Planet S1 - "Sweetness in the Family"
programme.desc: Cakes, maple syrup and taro puree tell a story of inheritance, memory and innovation in different parts of the world. They demonstrate how food can become a symbol of cultural identity and family heritage.

programme.title: Sweetness Migration
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Sweet Planet S1 - "Sweetness Migration"
programme.desc: The program reveals the unique attraction of sweet food that allows it to transcend geographical boundaries to become a bond shared worldwide, a form of cultural expression, and a means of heritage prevention.

programme.title: Haikou
programme.desc: Welcome to Haikou, also known as the Coconut City! Join Tianran experiencing the culinary culture and urban character of this tropical paradise. From light and sweet coconut chicken hotpot to refreshing herbal desserts and spicy rice soup.

programme.title: Hainans Four Famous Dishes
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Foodwise S2 - "Hainans Four Famous Dishes"
programme.desc: The stunning east coast of Hainan in southeast China, attract numerous visitors to travel. Hainan’s four famous dishes are chicken, duck, goat and crab.

programme.title: Xishuangbanna Part 1
programme.desc: From dazzling night markets to lush bamboo forests, 800 year old tea trees to close encounters with elephants, this tropical city in southwest China has everything, and is where the story of tea begins.

programme.title: Coconut
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Coconut"
programme.desc: Explore the boundless potential of coconuts with Lauren as she reinvents a calamari dish using coconut flesh, offering a taste experience that will leave you in awe and redefine your culinary perceptions.

programme.title: Banana
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Banana"
programme.desc: Indulge in the versatile world of bananas as Lauren skillfully crafts recipes, from banana flour sourdough bread to twist-infused pancakes, offering a tantalizing experience that showcases the endless possibilities of this humble fruit.

programme.title: Potato
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Potato"
programme.desc: Lauren explores the culinary possibilities of the humble potato. She demonstrates how to make perfect crispy potato wedges, a hearty potato and vegetable curry, and homemade gnocchi recipe that is hard to beat.

programme.title: Eric Trochon – Solstice
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Taste of France S1 - "Eric Trochon – Solstice"
programme.desc: Today we’ll visit the wonderful city of Paris and the restaurant of Eric Trochon - Solstice - an informal yet elegant restaurant awarded with a Michelin star.

programme.title: Pascal Barbot - Astrance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Taste of France S1 - "Pascal Barbot - Astrance"
programme.desc: In today’s program we will visit the star-chef Pascal Barbot, who became independent at age twenty-seven. Reservations at his 2 star Michelin-awarded restaurant Astrance are booked months ahead.

programme.title: Daniel Barratier – L’Auberge Sur-les-Bois
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Taste of France S1 - "Daniel Barratier – L’Auberge Sur-les-Bois"
programme.desc: Daniel Barratier has worked with some of the best chefs traveling the world, now he’s back in his hometown, Annecy, the ”Venice of the French Alps" were he invested in a true fine dining restaurant.

programme.title: Philippines
programme.desc: The nation of 7,000 islands has no problems with beach, sun, or sea; but they suffer tremendously with cuisine image. Jonathan lands in Manila to discover the top chefs are well aware of the issue and, following their advice, he launches off on an expedition to find part of the solution. Driving from headhunting tribal villages, to step-back-in-time colonial towns, to restaurants in the shadow of the American military behemoth an intriguing story slowly pieces together. In the dense jungle one treasure stays buried while another comes literally out of the woodwork. But danger always lurks.. zombie moray eels, landslide prone passes, and forbidden fields behind the rice paddies.

programme.title: Seychelles
programme.desc: Not just one glorious tropical island paradise, but 2! Sashi heads to the best resort in Maldives, Soneva Jani to get a taste of their brand new culinary experience. Then he heads to East Africa to experience the best of Seychelles! This is a Max Foodie adventure unlike any other!

programme.title: Maldives / Soneva Jani
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Maximum Foodie S4 - "Maldives / Soneva Jani"
programme.desc: Not just one glorious tropical island paradise, but 2! Sashi heads to the best resort in Maldives, Soneva Jani to get a taste of their brand new culinary experience. Then he heads to East Africa to experience the best of Seychelles! This is a Max Foodie adventure unlike any other!

programme.title: Xishuangbanna Part 2
programme.desc: Come get soaked at the Dai peoples New Year celebrations! All this before hiking through an actual rainforest. Were going to need all the good tea and food we can get!

programme.title: Huangshan Part 1
programme.desc: Tianran and Hannah climb Mount Huangshan, one of Chinas most famous mountains, sampling its delicate green tea and the rich flavors of Anhui cuisine, and explore the regionss ancient villages and lush bamboo forests.

programme.title: Huangshan Part 2
programme.desc: The hosts enjoy a cup of Queen Elizabeth IIs favorite tea, as well as the oldest tea to be exported Europe, and get hands on with quirky local delicacies.

programme.title: Tofu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Tofu"
programme.desc: Discover the delicious and nutritious world of tofu with Lauren as she experiments with various textures and flavors, pushing the soybean to its limits to create amazing dishes like Scramble tofu and the sweet-spicy delight of Tahu Gejrot.

programme.title: Mushroom
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Mushroom"
programme.desc: Lauren dives into the fascinating world of mushrooms, exploring their flavors, textures, and health benefits. She shows how to make savory mushroom sausage rolls and delicious mushroom steaks, showcasing the versatility of these earthy ingredients.

programme.title: Chocolate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Paradise Kitchen Bali S1 - "Chocolate"
programme.desc: Indulge in Laurens exploration of the chocolate world as she uncovers its unique types and characteristics. From savory chocolate salsa to raw vegan cake, her mix of sweet and savory recipes leaves a lasting appreciation for this beloved ingredient.

programme.title: Sweet Inspiration
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Sweet Planet S1 - "Sweet Inspiration"
programme.desc: This episode show how people draw inspiration from society to create food, thereby bringing a richer and more colorful dietary culture.

programme.title: Seychelles
programme.desc: Not just one glorious tropical island paradise, but 2! Sashi heads to the best resort in Maldives, Soneva Jani to get a taste of their brand new culinary experience. Then he heads to East Africa to experience the best of Seychelles! This is a Max Foodie adventure unlike any other!

programme.title: Maldives / Soneva Jani
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Maximum Foodie S4 - "Maldives / Soneva Jani"
programme.desc: Not just one glorious tropical island paradise, but 2! Sashi heads to the best resort in Maldives, Soneva Jani to get a taste of their brand new culinary experience. Then he heads to East Africa to experience the best of Seychelles! This is a Max Foodie adventure unlike any other!

programme.title: Paris
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx travels to Paris, the city of love, for inspiration and discovers its diversity and a creative trend called retrofuture.

programme.title: Berlin
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx journeys Berlin, one of the worlds undisputed techno capitals, and discovers the sound of freedom buried in its history.

programme.title: Maui
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Maui"
programme.desc: Tyler Larronde beats the odds to execute a seamless barrel at the legendary big wave known as Mavericks.

programme.title: Family Values
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Family Values"
programme.desc: A new generation of female chargers band together to compete in a unique big wave surfing ‘expression session’ on the north shore of Oahu.

programme.title: Goma, Congo
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Goma, Congo"
programme.desc: Bboy Junior is going back where he was born, The Democratic Republic of Congo. World champion Shigekix will join him, visiting Africa for the first time. Together they will explore the dance culture in the city of Goma.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Streets S1 - "Las Vegas"
programme.desc: Las Vegas is home to a hot rod car club community which over the decades has been connected to the rise of rockabilly music. Through Luke Metz and his band, Shanda and The Howlers, we learn how this bond between fashion, music and cars was created.

programme.title: Eco-Explore Your Backyard - California Coast to Santa Barbara
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Big Little Footprints S1 - "Eco-Explore Your Backyard - California Coast to Santa Barbara"
programme.desc: In this episode we remind viewers just how much you can find when exploring your own backyard by road tripping the California Coast to Santa Barbara! Swapping TV time to chats around the campfire and an exciting encounter with sea lions.

programme.title: Big Resort, Big Heart - Atlantis Bahamas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Big Little Footprints S1 - "Big Resort, Big Heart - Atlantis Bahamas"
programme.desc: If the Atlantis Bahamas isn’t on your familys bucket list - it should be! We’ll show you why as each family member ticks off their dream adventure that also gives back. Proving this big resort has an even bigger heart.

programme.title: Ranch Life - Texas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Big Little Footprints S1 - "Ranch Life - Texas"
programme.desc: Sometimes exploring the road less traveled gives you the biggest adventure. In this episode, we escape the city buzz and opt for a quieter life on a Texas ranch. Taking time to appreciate the beauty in history, animals and quality time as a family.

programme.title: Crete - Rethymno
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 My Greek Odyssey S5 - "Crete - Rethymno"
programme.desc: These are Peter’s final days on Crete, which means there’s a lot to see and do before he’s back with the crew aboard Mia Zoi.

programme.title: Santorini
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 My Greek Odyssey S5 - "Santorini"
programme.desc: Peter travels to Santorini for the next stage of his journey. Exploring the history, culture and food the island has to offer.

programme.title: Santorini to Thirasia
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 My Greek Odyssey S5 - "Santorini to Thirasia"
programme.desc: Peter spends some time exploring Santorini and visits the island of Therassia, and Kyriako prepares a snack using eggplants.

programme.title: Croatia - Istria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Wonders Of... S1 - "Croatia - Istria"
programme.desc: Every grape, tree, shell, and animal brings rich rewards, but the hands that prepare them are even more prized. Ashley is eager to learn the trades, walk where Romans walked, ride to fairytale lands and become accepted into local families.

programme.title: Croatia - Split
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Wonders Of... S1 - "Croatia - Split"
programme.desc: Life moves at a different pace along this cultural center of Dalmatia. The most prized islands are off the coast of Split and Ashley finds the oldest and last grappa distillery on the island of Hvar using an ancient recipe.

programme.title: Croatia - Kvarner
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Wonders Of... S1 - "Croatia - Kvarner"
programme.desc: Overcoming a turbulent past, this is where tourism and the Croatian language were written. Full of islands, coastal areas and mountaintops, this rich landscape was settled by the wealthy.

programme.title: Ice Hotel, Sweden - Bangkok
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Ice Hotel, Sweden - Bangkok"
programme.desc: From the hustle and bustle of Bangkok to the freezing temperatures of the Ice Hotel in Sweden, this episode is all about polar opposites, fire and ice.

programme.title: St Tropez - St Lucia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "St Tropez - St Lucia"
programme.desc: Romantic Caribbean Islands and sleeping fishing villages turned European jet set resorts, this episode travels from St Lucia to St Tropez.

programme.title: Ulagala, Sri Lanka - Florence
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Ulagala, Sri Lanka - Florence"
programme.desc: From Michael Angelo’s David in Florence to elephant safaris in Sri Lanka, this is an art lovers and outdoorsy adventure.

programme.title: Ice Hotel and Cayman
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Travel in Style S3 - "Ice Hotel and Cayman"
programme.desc: Braving artic conditions and spending a night in the beautiful but chilly Ice Hotel. Then its thawing out time in the Cayman Islands, swimming in the clear warm Caribbean waters and having fun playing with dolphins.

programme.title: St Tropez and Ulagalla
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Travel in Style S3 - "St Tropez and Ulagalla"
programme.desc: Join us in St Tropez, the playground of the French Riviera where the rich and famous flock each year to sunbath in style. It’s then culture vulture time when we visit some magnificent temples in Sri Lanka.

programme.title: Caiscais and Uga Bay
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Travel in Style S3 - "Caiscais and Uga Bay"
programme.desc: Home to some of the best golf courses in Portugal, the eighteen hole Oitavos links course. And how about testing your wood carving skills and elephant back riding ability in the hills of Uga Bay in Sri Lanka?

programme.title: Thailand, China
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 A Taste of Travel S2 - "Thailand, China"
programme.desc: Join Scotty as he embarks on a trip through Thailand, before visiting QLD…and Alana arrives in China.

programme.title: China’s Great Wall
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 A Taste of Travel S2 - "China’s Great Wall"
programme.desc: Scotty’s trip to Thailand heats up at a local cooking school, before he takes a segue tour of Brisbane, and Alana visits one of the wonders of the world – China’s Great Wall.

programme.title: Queensland’s Granite Belt
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 A Taste of Travel S2 - "Queensland’s Granite Belt"
programme.desc: Scotty finds his happy place, in Queensland’s Granite Belt, and Alana get’s a taste of Beijing’s old city, before visiting the spice market in Istanbul.

programme.title: Tahiti (Pt 1)
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 The Travel Bug S6 - "Tahiti (Pt 1)"
programme.desc: The first of a two-part special in Tahiti sees Morgan kicking things off in the capital, Papeete. It’s quite a contrast to what you see in other parts of French Polynesia and many travellers never take the time to check it out.

programme.title: Tahiti (Pt 2)
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 The Travel Bug S6 - "Tahiti (Pt 2)"
programme.desc: In part 2 of Morgan’s Tahitian adventure, he visits the spectacular islands of Huahine and Rangiroa. They’re two of the most idyllic Pacific paradises you’ll come across and the sorts of places most travellers dream of someday visiting.

programme.title: Malta (Pt 1)
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 The Travel Bug S6 - "Malta (Pt 1)"
programme.desc: In this episode we’re starting a two-week exploration of Malta. It’s home to some of the oldest and most significant ruins on the planet and loads of fascinating sites from the many powers that have ruled here throughout the centuries.

programme.title: Luxury With Purpose - Belize
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Big Little Footprints S1 - "Luxury With Purpose - Belize"
programme.desc: Join us on an epic adventure to a remote private island in Belize. As we spend our days catching lobsters, diving the worldclass reef and enjoying coconuts straight from the tree. We also learn about how much our tourism dollars really count.

programme.title: Daring Dive into Conservation - Fiji
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Big Little Footprints S1 - "Daring Dive into Conservation - Fiji"
programme.desc: We travel to an island resort in Fiji known for it’s daring shark encounters! To hear and see first hand the amazing conservation work they’re doing. Along the way we meet the local school kids and learn about how they’re helping protect the reef.

programme.title: Travel That Transforms Fiji
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Big Little Footprints S1 - "Travel That Transforms Fiji"
programme.desc: We travel to an idyllic island in the South Pacific, known for its enviable coral reef and chance to swim with giant Manta Rays! We also visit the local village to learn about its important relationship with the resort and hear how tourism has helped

programme.title: Thirasia to Anafi
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 My Greek Odyssey S5 - "Thirasia to Anafi"
programme.desc: Peter travels east to the island of Anafi, a far corner of Greece for those looking to escape the masses and interact with locals.

programme.title: Amorgos
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 My Greek Odyssey S5 - "Amorgos"
programme.desc: This episode of My Greek Odyssey will see Peter visiting three islands, each with their own unique stories.

programme.desc: Josh jaa jumiin pitkalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivokselle, kun pultit irtoavat kaivinkoneesta eika han voi kutsua apua.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaivoskausi alkaa, ja vaikka jadea ei nay, rekkaonnettomuus tuo Jade Citylle onnea.

programme.desc: Juuri kun Wolverinen miehisto tehostaa turvallisuusmenetelmiaan, uusi tyontekija Jay romahtaa, mika paljastaa heidan hatavalmiutensa sarot.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kilpailu on kaynnissa, jotta Wolverinen leirista paastaan pois ennen kuin kaikki jaa lumen alle.

programme.desc: Claudia joutuu ajamaan kiviautoa, kun hanen miehistonsa kamppailee kivista polkua ylos Wolverinen vuorenhuipulla sijaitsevaan leiriin.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Uusi kaivoskausi on taynna ikavia yllatyksia, mutta epatodennakoinen tapahtuma pelastaa tilanteen.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Needles are found on one woman while a stun gun is discovered on another. A DUI test stirs up bad memories for a man driving while intoxicated, and a convicted murderer becomes violent.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman comes clean to having drugs hidden where they can’t be seen. An inmate’s exotic makeup is cleverly created with candy and toothpaste. A couple is surprised to find that holding someone against their will is a felony. Doing the right thing turns into an extended stay for a woman with warrants.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: We follow the men and women of LVMPD as they do their best to tame the New Years Eve festivities up and down the Las Vegas Strip.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Code Blue alarms sound as inmates start fighting inside the men’s jail. An irate man with a huge beard refuses to remove bands inside his facial hair. A man with deep stab wounds stumbles into jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman tries to conceal illegal substances in her bra. Bandmates are charged for tresspassing, and two inmates are separated and placed in restraints after losing control.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in womens lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Three inmates start brawling inside the drunk tank. One man must wear a mask so that officers can avoid his rain of spit. A young woman fails to take jail seriously and behaves provocatively.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR a man in custody accuses officers of being involved in the 1992 event at Ruby Ridge. In Sarasota, FL a drunk man falls off his bike and purports to have been hit by a car. In Las Vegas, LV a daring inmate attempts to make a break for it while the supervising officers attend to a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man brought in for trespassing becomes violent. A sex worker admits she۪s witholding her pediculosis condition from clients. A woman explains her tattoos are a reminder of the women she loved.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man believes he is an alien wrongfully arrested for obstruction. Claiming to be a law school student, a man just doesn’t understand why he was arrested for trespassing. A woman claims she swallowed her friend’s pills for good reason. A family reunion ends with a bruised and bloodied husband.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man attacks a medical officer and officers rush to intervene. After destroying a tree and unleashing pigeons, a woman is arrested. Unease is caused by a man’s menacing glare during his booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers transfer an over caffeinated suspect to isolation so he can unwind. A man arrested for DUI while doing donuts in a mall parking lot asserts he was robbed. A jaywalking Utah man claims someone hit him on the head. A disgruntled detainee lands a sucker punch on a fellow inmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate claims to be the victim of an internet scam which led to his arrest. Officers take it easy on a rowdy inmate struggling through a spiritual crisis. Years of prison time can’t sway a young gang affiliate from changing his ways. Prisoners cause plumbing problems to send a message. A mother and daughter bond over being locked up together.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Over the course of a single shift, officers are forced to go toe to toe with a hotheaded inmate refusing to change cells without a fight and then must deal with the whims of a homeless man who demands room service and an upgraded jail cell.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A defiant suspect’s behavior takes a turn for the worse after being placed in the restraining chair. A spit mask wearing suspect attempts to procure enhancing supplements from a jail nurse. An intoxicated male suspect swoons for a certain female officer. A local vagrant is taken into custody after attempting to retrieve some things from his ex wife’s house.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A jail chaplain counsels a sad inmate. An intoxicated woman demands to talk to the Canadian Embassy.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a truculent man is sent to the drunk-tank to sober up. In Portland, OR a drunk woman is jailed for attacking a child. In Sarasota, FL an intoxicated man has difficulty recalling why hes been arrested. In Spokane, WA a man "borrows" a car to curb his drug habit.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Acts of aggression cause a man to be placed in a restraint chair. Jail lockdown occurs after an inmate is stabbed with a pencil. After being booked for road rage a woman unleashes a venomous tirade.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An arrested man is caught on camera making a run for freedom. An addict returns to jail and tells officers that meth is controlling his mind. Humility may be the key for one man to quit his life of crime. A shoplifter calls 9-1-1 to help him get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man in detention is paranoid about officers handling him inappropriately. A man in custody claims to have a seizure. A man is taken in to custody for stealing videogaming equipment.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate refuses to be handcuffed while officers seek to search his cell for contraband. A man tells deputies he is known as “Baby Boy” amongst the ladies. Fights erupt during prison phone time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E17 Gone to the Dogs
programme.desc: Officers find hidden drugs on a burglary suspect during a pat down that leads to a tense confrontation. A beer sets off a fight between a mom and her daughter causing one family member to end up in jail. A rare event takes place in the county jail - a woman arrested for a warrant is in a good mood. Punching a pit bull while drunk lands in man in jail where he comes face to face with a childhood hero.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT an inebriated man gets aggressive and questions why hes in custody. In Sarasota, FL a couple are taken in for assaulting a bartender. In Portland, OR a man is placed in custody for harassing movie theater security guards. In Las Vegas, NV a chauffeur is placed in custody for amassing a number of of moving violations.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man thinks the doctors are CIA agents. A homeless karate practitioners actions land him in an isolated cell, and a Canadian man with no pants wants to arm wrestle.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Two sisters go on a mini-crime spree, get caught and find no one will bail them out. A domestic argument about night fishing lands a husband in jail for breaking into his own car. An irate inmate blows off steam by doing laps in her jail cell. A woman finds out it’s hard to stop selling drugs when the neighborhood knows her business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An aspiring martial-arts fighter tries to wriggle out of handcuffs and gets stuck. A football rivalry takes a bad turn when a Steelers fan assaults a Ravens fan.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody. A dad gets busted for DUI while on his way to pick up a pizza for his kids. Officers recover drugs from a suspect’s pocket who is puzzled as to how they got there. A woman learns the hard way “what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Melee in the Cell
programme.desc: A brawl breaks out between inmates during a routine jail breakfast. An inmate alters their uniform in provocative and outlandish ways. Concerns abound as one-man issues violent threats at deputies.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man admits to urinating in public. A couple spends their date night in jail after being over served, and a DUI suspect passes out during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies corral a suspect into a cell after serious turmoil. A man becomes suicidal after being brought in on burglary charges. Facing the gavel, a prisoner berates a Judge during court proceedings.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers have difficulty booking an incomprehensible man. A commotion at a church ends in arrest. A man wearing a tuxedo is detained after mocking officers for wearing “pig suits.”

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E19 A Night of Fights
programme.desc: A man tries to swallow his ring. A heroin addict wants help when he realizes his habit has cost him everything he loves. A habitual criminal is worried that other inmates will fight over him.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an honest offender turns himself in. Officers arrest an underage woman who admits to driving under the influence. A woman is taken into custody after harming herself with a pair of scissors

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers warn a man that dressing up like a clown in Texas is not a good idea. A shotgun is found in the hoodie of a man arrested for riding his bicycle without a headlight. programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A cell brawl escalates quickly. After being arrested on her wedding night, a woman has deep regrets and serious reflection. Officers free a man from his own noose and place him on a vigilant watch.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate interrupts the booking process. A couple is brought in after signs of a domestic dispute but claim they were being intimate, and a jailed woman shares some of her Webcam exploits.

programme.title: Jail

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated inmate escapes his restraints. A young woman denies she abused her mother, and a guard removes an inmate who is causing a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman is placed in a restraint chair. A troubled woman with a drug addiction is brought in on prostitution charges. One man is taken to a sobering cell to sleep off his intoxication.

programme.title: Jail

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man fresh out of prison tries to prove how tough he is. A drunk woman rages against everyone in her path.
