programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Acts of aggression cause a man to be placed in a restraint chair. Jail lockdown occurs after an inmate is stabbed with a pencil. After being booked for road rage a woman unleashes a venomous tirade.

programme.title: The Rules of Attraction
programme.desc: Jessica Biel, James Van Der Beek ja Ian Somerhalder tuovat elamaa ja naurua tahan rehelliseen, nokkelaan tarinaan yliopiston sosiaalisista ja seksuaalisista suhteista.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: 36 Husbands
programme.desc: 36 Husbands on mystinen, musikaalinen Kung Fu -vakoojakomedia, jonka paaosissa on 3 vahvaa naista - ja joukko aviomiehia. Kristalla, huippuvakoojalla ja Kung Fu -mestarilla, on poikkeuksellisia voimia, ja han ottaa ne kayttoon pyrkiessaan hidastamaan tasaista kulkua kohti kolmatta maailmansotaa.

programme.title: Peace, Love and Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Komedia menestyksekkaasta newyorkilaisesta asianajajasta (Catherine Keener), joka tuo mukanaan kaksi vilkasta teini-ikaista lastaan hippiaitinsa (Jane Fonda) luo maalle perhelomalle. Rentouttava viikonloppu muuttuu kuitenkin pian seikkailun, romantiikan, musiikin, perhesalaisuuk sien ja itsensa loytamisen kesaksi.

programme.title: Mama Weed
programme.desc: Kun alipalkattu poliisin tulkki huomaa takavarikon yhteydessa, etta yksi osallisista on hanen lahipiiriaan, han tekee kohtalokkaan paatoksen. Han onnistuu takavarikoimaan jattimaisen hasiseran, jonka seka poliisi etta alamaailma haluavat, ja kenttakokemuksellaan ja poliisin resursseilla han aloittaa oman rikollisen toimintansa ja vaihtaa huumediilerin uraan.

programme.title: Pete Smalls Is Dead
programme.desc: Hollywoodin taakseen jattanyt kasikirjoittaja joutuu palaamaan unelmien kaupunkiin ohjaajaystavansa kuoltua.

programme.title: Break Point
programme.desc: Veljekset Jimmy ja Darren ovat vieraantuneet toisistaan. Darren on rahapulassa ja Jimmy haluaa tehda paluun tennismaailman huipulle. Siispa he paattavat lyottaytya yhteen, perustaa uudelleen nuoruutensa nelinpeliparin ja pyrkia Grand Slam -turnaukseen karsintojen kautta. Kumpikaan ei ole entisessa vedossaan, mutta erikoisten ystaviensa ja rohkaisevan, vaikkakin kyynisen isansa avulla nama nahjusmaiset sankarit saattavat oppia voittamaan parhaimmatkin vastustajansa. Rooleissa muun muassa koomikot Jeremy Sisto, Adam Devine ja Oscar®-palkittu J.K. Simmons.

programme.title: Kuuhullut (Moonstruck)
programme.desc: Tassa klassisessa romanttisessa komediassa Brooklynin leski (Cher) on valmis menemaan uudelleen naimisiin. Talla kertaa han aikoo tehda sen oikein, vaikka joutuisikin sanomaan ”kylla” miehelle, jota han ei oikeasti rakasta. Mutta kun han rakastuu sulhasensa veljeen (Nicolas Cage), seuraa romanttinen mutka, joka on arvoinen suurimpia koomisia oopperoita! Olympia Dukakis on myos mukana.

programme.title: Joe - jokapaikan hoyla
programme.desc: Tim Allenin esittama Joe on mies, jonka elama on muuttunut vakaasti aina vain surkeammaksi. Kun toimiston kiusaaja menee liian pitkalle, Joe paattaa vihdoin muuttua mitattomyydesta joksikin paremmaksi.

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: Raavittoman hauska ja torkean naurattava kauhukomedia Paranormal Activityn tyyliin. Rakastunut nuoripari Malcom ja Keisha muuttavat unelmiensa taloon aloittaakseen yhteisen elamansa. Pian talossa alkaa tapahtua mystisia asioita ja selviaa, etteivat he olekaan kahden vaan Keishan on riivannut havyton demoni. Ahdistunut Malcom palkkaa manaajan ja lopulta nykypaivan Ghostbustersitkin ajamaan pois pahan hengen, joka terrorisoi hanen parisuhdettaan… ja ennen kaikkea seksielamaansa.

programme.title: Fast Food Nation
programme.desc: Don Anderson on Mickey’sin markkinointivastaava, joka kehitti myos firman suurimman menestyspurilaisen, Big Onen. Tutkimukset paljastavat, etta purilaisten sisalto ei vastaa tuoteselostetta, jolloin Don paattaa alkaa tutkia koko tuotantoketjua. Hanen loytonsa ovat lievasti sanoen jarkyttavia. Fast Food Nation on Oscar-ehdokkaan Richard Linklaterin (Boyhood, Rakkautta ennen aamua) ohjaama draamakomedia, jossa vaikuttavat Greg Kinnear (Little Miss Sunshine, Elama on ihanaa) ja Bruce Willis (Die Hard, Moonrise Kingdom).

programme.title: Wheres The Money
programme.desc: South Los Angelesista kotoisin oleva nuori ja terava Del saa tietaa, etta hanen vankilassa istuva isansa ja juuri telkien takaa vapautunut setansa ovat varastaneet miljoona dollaria, jotka ovat katkettyina eraan vanhan rakennuksen kellarissa. On vain yksi pieni ongelma: arvostettu yliopisto on levittaytynyt naapurustoon, ja vanha yomaja on askettain keskiluokkaistunut valkoisten opiskelijoiden veljeskuntatalo.

programme.title: 7 Days to Vegas
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva tarina Hollywoodin isokenkaisista, jotka lyovat vetoa mista vain. Duke on parhaat paivansa nahnyt entinen nayttelija, joka asuu yha Los Angelesissa ja jarjestaa laittomia pokeripeleja erikoisille tyypeille. Eraana paivana peliin liittyy ohjaaja Sebastian, josta tulee pian porukan paras pelaaja. Han on tyypillinen Hollywoodin mantti elokuvaohjaaja, joka tuntee rikasta ja pelihaluista vakea. Duke tekee yhteistyota Sebastianin kanssa ansaitakseen yha enemman rahaa. Sitten alkaakin vedonlyonti siita, voiko mies kavella Las Vegasiin viikossa.

programme.title: Thanks for Sharing
programme.desc: Paallepain ymparistokonsultti Adamilla, yksityisyrittaja Mikella ja ensiapulaakari Neililla ei ole mitaan yhteista, mutta he kaikki ovat mukana 12 askeleen ohjelmassa kohti vapautta riippuvuuksistaan. Adam ei uskalla heittaytya uuteen rakkauteen, Mike yrittaa raivokkaasti kontrolloida perhettaan eika Danny suostu myontamaan ongelmiaan, mutta haasteet ja pienet askeleet yhdistaa miehet perheeksi, joka kannustaa, raivostuttaa ja kiittaa toisiaan matkalla uuteen elamaan.

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Uransa kanssa kamppaileva koomikko uhkapelaa epavarman tulevaisuutensa tehdessaan hullun suunnitelman saada lunnaiden avulla tiensa televisioon kidnappaamalla suositun keskusteluohjelman isannan.

programme.title: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
programme.desc: Yhdysvaltalaisen opinahjon sahlari vahtimestari ryhtyy koulun hairikkonuorten tennisvalmentajaksi. Tavoitteena on voittaa Nebraskan osavaltion tennismestaruus.

programme.title: Hamekytta - Pojasta Polvi Paranee
programme.desc: Todistettuaan murhan FBI-agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) ja hanen poikapuolensa (Brandon T. Jackson) joutuvat vetamaan valeasut niskaansa ja ryhtymaan tutkimuksiin – ainoastaan tytoille tarkoitetussa taidekoulussa. Entistakin enemman hauskuutta!

programme.title: Epic Movie
programme.desc: Tarina keskittyy neljaan ei-niin-nuoreen orpoon: yhden heista on kasvattanut Louvren kuraattori; toinen on pakolainen meksikolaisesta vapaapainista; kolmas askettainen hanen lentokoneessaan olleiden kaarmeiden uhri; ja neljas "normaali" asukas mutantti "X" -yhteisosta. Onneton kvartetti vierailee suklaatehtaalla, jossa he tormaavat lumottuun vaatekaappiin, joka kuljettaa heidat Gnarnian maahan (hiljaisella ”G”: lla). Siella he kohtaavat prameilevan merirosvokapteenin ja vilpittomat taikuuden opiskelijat – ja yhdistavat voimansa muun muassa viisaan, mutta kiimaisen leijonan kanssa voittaakseen Gnarnian ”Pahan Valkoisen Nartun”.

programme.title: Adult Life Skills
programme.desc: Anna on jumissa. Han on melkein 30, mutta asuu aitinsa puutarhavajassa, ei juttele juuri kenenkaan kanssa ja viettaa aikansa tekemalla lyhytelokuvia, joissa nayttelevat hanen peukalonsa. Jotakin puuttuu, ja eristyneisyys nayttaa olevan Annan tapa kasitella suurta surua. Mutta kun Anna sattumalta ystavystyy kahdeksanvuotiaan cowboyn kanssa, han alkaa pikkuhiljaa avautua. Adult Life Skills on Rachel Tunnardin ensimmainen pitka elokuva, joka kertoo yhta lailla surullisen kuin hauskankin tarinan kuolemasta ja sen kanssa elamisesta. Broadchurch-tahti Jodie Whittaker tulkitsee sulkeutuneen Annaan roolin kauniisti ja humoristisesti.

programme.title: Peace, Love and Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Komedia menestyksekkaasta newyorkilaisesta asianajajasta (Catherine Keener), joka tuo mukanaan kaksi vilkasta teini-ikaista lastaan hippiaitinsa (Jane Fonda) luo maalle perhelomalle. Rentouttava viikonloppu muuttuu kuitenkin pian seikkailun, romantiikan, musiikin, perhesalaisuuk sien ja itsensa loytamisen kesaksi.

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: Henrys Crime
programme.desc: Rikollisen hauskassa komediassa tahaton ryostoapuri Henry (Keanu Reeves) paatyy vankilaan suojellessaan todellisia syyllisia. Ulos paastyaan Henry paattaa tarttua toimeen ja tehda rikoksen, josta hanet on jo kertaalleen tuomittu. Apurikseen teatraaliseen pankkikeikkaan mies palkkaa entisen sellitoverinsa Maxin (James Caan). Mutta paasy pankin ja pienen teatterin yhdistavaan tunneliin vaatii kaivamisen lisaksi myos nayttelijanlahjoja.

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Nelja Vietnamin sodan vankileirilta selvinnytta veteraania paattaa suorittaa viimeisen pakonsa - vanhainkodista. Pakosuunnitelman tyostaminen seniilissa porukassa tuo kuitenkin omat haasteensa. Jokaisella on kuitenkin oma unelmansa, jonka vuoksi he ovat valmiita viimeiseen urotekoonsa - aina kun muistavat.

programme.title: The Stag
programme.desc: Moderni sulhanen suostuu vastentahtoisesti polttariviikonloppuun kaupunkilaisystaviensa kanssa. He lahtevat leireilemaan Lansi-Irlannin villiin luontoon. Porukan kauhuksi matkaan lyottaytyy morsiamen arvaamaton veli, johtajahahmo nimelta ”Kone”. Koneen rajahtava luonne ja hurjat johtamistavat vievat ryhman matkalle, jota he eivat unohda ikina.

programme.title: Nurse Betty
programme.desc: Betty katsoo uskollisesti lempisaippuasarjaansa “Syy rakastaa". Tormattyaan kahteen ammattitappajaan katsoessaan yhta sarjan jaksoa Betty muuttuu “Nurse Bettyksi" ja lahtee etsimaan sydamensa valittua, tohtori David Ravellia. Betty hakee unelmiensa prinssia hurjalla retkella halki maan, mutta ehtiiko han loytaa miehen ennen kuin tappajat loytavat hanet?

programme.title: MacGruber
programme.desc: Maailmanrauha on vaarassa, terroristit vaanivat, maailma tarvitsee supersankarin, jolla on tukka kuin Hillary Clintonilla. Kenelle pitaa soittaa? MacGruberille! Han on sotakone ilman asetta, mutta kehittaa mita vaan pelkasta klemmarista. Han on niin salainenagentti, etta kukaan ei edes tieda miehen etunimea! Naiset haluavat olla kuin han ja miehet haluavat olla hanen kanssaan... vai miten se meni?

programme.title: 68 Kill
programme.desc: Palkitun Trent Haagan ohjaama rakkaustarina feminiinisyydesta, maskuliinisuudesta ja 68 000 dollarin varkaudesta. Chip on simppeli kaveri, jolla on upea tyttoystava nimelta Liza. Liza tosin hankkii heidan elantonsa namusedaltaan, mutta toisaalta jokaisessa parisuhteessa on omat erikoisuutensa. Kun Liza ehdottaa, etta he veisivat limaiselta hyvantekijaltaan ison tukun rahaa, Chip nakee naisessa puolen, josta ei ole tiennyt mitaan… tai jonka olemassaoloa ei ole suostunut myontamaan. Nyt Chipilla on ase kasissaan, tytto perakopissaan ja alle 24 tuntia aikaa selvita melkoisesta sotkusta.

programme.title: To Rome With Love
programme.desc: To Rome With Love on yhteen maailman hurmaavimmista kaupungeista sijoittuva kaleidoskooppinen komedia, jota tahdittavat mm. Alec Baldwin ja Penelope Cruz seka elokuvan ohjaaja Woody Allen. Tutustumme mm. Roomassa lomailevaan,tunnettuun amerikkalaiseen arkkitehtiin, jonka reissu muuttuu aikamatkaksi hanen omaan nuoruuteensa seka keskiluokkaiseen ja perin tavalliseen paikalliseen perheenisaan, josta yhtakkia tuleekin superjulkkis. Ikuisen kaupungin kapeilla kujilla nuoret rakastavaiset Antonio ja Milly joutuvat tahoillaan kummallisten ja romanttisten kohtaamisten kieputukseen.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: An unholy alliance! Marking the feature film debut of one of Hollywoods most influential and widely referenced auteur directors, Sam Peckinpah, The Deadly Companions centers on a redemptive journey to escort a funeral procession through dangerous Indian Territory. Featuring fine work from a top-notch cast that includes the inimitable Maureen OHara at the height of her illustrious career, Peckinpahs first foray into film provides a promising glance into the energetic and violent nature of his iconic later works.

programme.title: Colorado Kid
programme.desc: Cowboy star Bob Steele (Valley of Hunted Men, The Trail Blazers) headlines this Poverty Row western drama. As the Colorado Kid, hes falsely arrested for murder and has to clear himself. The colorful cast includes Ernie Adams, Frank LaRue, and Horace Murphy, with direction by Sam Newfield (The Terror of Tiny Town, The Mad Monster).

programme.title: Lost Canyon
programme.desc: When Johnny Travers (Jay Kirby) is falsely accused of robbing a bank, its up to Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) to clear his name and find the real villains. Theres nothing better than watching Hoppy get rough with the rustlers, and its all the better when you get to hear the Sportsmen Quartette sing (I got Spurs) Jingle, Jangle, Jingle.

programme.title: Hawk of the Hills
programme.desc: A band of Indians led by the Hawk terrorizes prospectors in a valley. HAWK OF THE HILLS was originally released as a ten episode serial in 1927 but was re-edited into a five-reel feature (the version presented here) in 1929.

programme.title: Red Ryder: Ride, Ryder, Ride!
programme.desc: Red Ryder encounters bandits trying to hold up the stagecoach carrying the owner of the Devils Hole newspaper, Libby Brooks and her brother Gerry. Red successfully drives off the attackers but becomes embroiled in further conflict, leading to a duel that nearly claims his life.

programme.title: With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre
programme.desc: A long-thought-lost film finally surfaces after being unseen for over eight decades. Created and copyrighted by Sunset Productions in 1925 but not released until June 15, 1927, this silent epic features the superior Native American actor Chief Yowlachie (performing here under the name Chief Yowlache) as Sitting Bull. Other fine actors in the cast include the always popular Bryant Washburn and a young Bob Steele, who appears under his real name Bob Bradbury Jr. The story takes place in the 1860s or 1870s near Spirit Lake, Iowa. Settlements of whites are growing in that region but the Sioux Indians also have professed their interest in one such settlement. Chief Sitting Bull surveys the...

programme.title: The Two Gun Man
programme.desc: Ken Maynard stars in this vintage western about ranchers under threat from hired gunmen. Director Phil Rosen, whose career dated back to working with Thomas Edison and included several Charlie Chan features, keeps the action hot with help from a strong ensemble, including Charles King, Murdock MacQuarrie, and a horse named Tarzan! Maynard plays Blackie Weed, a marshall going undercover to capture and arrest some cattle rustlers.He finds himself up against some very bad men, and hes soon framed for murder. Watch as Blackie blazes his way to vindication with a .45 in either hand and the flame of righteous anger in his eyes... Kitty: Nita Martin. Joe Kearney: Lafe McKee. Lem Tolliver: Tom...

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, the G-Men are sent to the Ozarks to track down gold stolen from the U.S. Government. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: An outlaw gang is stealing gold from Chinese placer miners, then driving off their claims with outrageous taxes. Because theyre Chinese, they cant sue the local government agents. With Stoney posing as a Chinese miner and Pat pretending to be a representative of an Eastern engineering company, the U.S. government tries to bring an end to the careers of the outlaw gang and crooked state government agents.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Bobbie Jo and the Beatnik
programme.desc: Bobbie Jo falls head over heals for an edgy young poet from New York. He likes her, too, but hes not fond of Hooterville. Of coure, Kate has to show Bobby Jo what this pompous fool is all about. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963. Look for Dennis Hopper as the beatnik.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 My Daughter the Doctor
programme.desc: The family wants Billie Jo to become a doctor, but she wants to go to Hollywood to become an actress. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. And be sure to look for Adam West in a pre-Batman role as Doctor Clayton Harris. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in January, 1964.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is shot dead after discovering oil on his property. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951 .It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: An ex-con is released from prison seeking vengeance against those who put him there. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie face off with a murdering desperado who has been terrorizing the northwest. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Also starring Steve Brodie, RIchard Avonde, Helen Wallace, Gene Roth, and Edward Clark. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954 .Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Wild Bunch of Wyoming
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie meet the Wild Bunch and their jovial leader Butch Cassidy.Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Also starring Joe Sawyer, Slim Pickens, Lane Chandler, and Bob Carney. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired in 1954. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: While attempting to steal land from an Indian tribe, crooked ranchers kill one of the braves. The Judge must move fast to prevent an all-out massacre. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In Family Ties, Judge Bean comes to the aid of the Peralta family as unscrupulous real estate agents try to force them off their land. Theyve learned that a railroad will need the property and they intend to make an undeserved profit. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Annie and the Lily Maid
programme.desc: Choctaw looks to inherit the ranch of the murdered Sam Forbes, but Elaine, a previously unknown niece, appears, making Annie suspicious as the men fall for her seemingly delicate nature. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Vic Carver, and his brother Johnny, searches for Annies Uncle Luke to enact revenge. Annie successfully gets her uncle out of town, but an angry Vic kidnaps Tagg. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook suspect that a young mans uncle is behind the recent attacks against him. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A man asserts that he has a Royal Grant that gives him ownership of the entire town.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in November, 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joes date, Jennifer, is abducted and held for ransom at the circus. He and Hoss search the circus for her, facing a tough crowd of carnies in their search.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: The Gay Cavalier
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid, along with Pancho, try to help an unhappy bride.

programme.title: Heart of the Golden West
programme.desc: Roy Rogers, Gabby Hayes, and Smiley Burnette team up to protect the ranchers of Cherokee City from the false charges of illegal cattle trafficking. It may seem like the odds are against Roy, but just watch as he changes the course of the law with his flaming bullets, and, of course, a few songs. For trivia buffs: Smiley Burnette joined Roy because Gene Autry, the actor for whom he usually served as a sidekick, had joined the service!

programme.title: Cowboy and the Senorita
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Trigger get top billing in this one, while the senorita of the title, Dale Evans, is billed fourth. Maybe Dale needed a better agent! Then again, who pays attention to screen credits when you have such a funfilled fiesta of thrills and action? Roys most zestful musical adventure is about a worthless gold mine that turns out to have a hidden shaft filled with riches. But can Roy make the claim while hes trying to outrun a trumped up robbery charge? Its romance, rhythm, and revelry, all from Republic Pictures. Musical numbers include Bunk House Bugle Boy and Besame Mucho, plus the beautiful title song performed by Roy!

programme.title: Cowboy And The Prizefighter
programme.desc: Red Ryder takes Steve Stevenson, who has saved his life, to his ranch and gives him a job. Reds aunt, the Duchess, knew Steves father, who supposedly committed suicide after losing his ranch betting on a prizefight. Steve refuses to believe that his father took his own life, suspecting he was murdered. Red and Little Beaver aid Steve in finding his father killer.

programme.title: Daniel Boone, Trailblazer
programme.desc: Daniel Boone (Bruce Bennett) battles Shawnee warriors as he leads a band of settlers into Kentucky in this frontier potboiler from Albert C. Gannaway Productions. Made at the height of Hollywoods fascination with pioneer days, the film also stars Lon Chaney Jr. as Chief Blackfish, and country singer Faron Young as a handsome young suitor for Boones daughter. Theres plenty of action and danger here as the Shawnee are convinced that Boone is trying to steal their land. But Boone is ready, not even fearing death by tomahawk. It isnt how you die, Boone says. Its what you live for.

programme.title: The Lucky Texan
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this vintage western. He and George Gabby Hayes strike it rich with a gold mine, only to find their lives complicated by women and crooked officials. Things get even messier when the good guys are framed for murder! Its all action here, particularly since legendary stuntman Yakima Cannut stars as one of the films heavies. Who will win the fight over the gold and the girl? Directed by Robert N. Bradbury for Monogram Pictures. Also starring Barbara Sheldon. (The film was also known as Gold Strike River.)

programme.title: Courageous Avenger
programme.desc: Gold, gangs, and the heroic fight for life! Johnny Mack Brown (Billy the Kid, Coquette) stars in this western thriller about murders going on in a mining community. Its a story full of twists, where the greed for gold is only surpassed by the struggle for life!

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: A love story and a search for gold in the Valley of Death! Dubbed simple, powerful and dramatic by the New York Times on the date of its release, Death Valley is indeed an elegant depiction of love and deception in the American desert during the Gold Rush. In what was to be the final film of famed silent film director Paul Powell (Polyanna), a cast of mostly unknown actors produces uniformly excellent work. Lyrical and graceful, Powells film spins the tale of a young boy who finds love and gold, only to have it stolen from him.

programme.title: Outpost In Morocco
programme.desc: George Raft, Mary Windsor, and Akim Tamiroff star in this romantic drama from director Robert Florey (The Florentine Dagger, Daughter of Shanghai). Raft plays Capt. Gerard, a member of the Foreign Legion known for his romantic entanglements. Hes assigned to escort an emirs daughter to her fathers mountain citadel and learn about the emirs activities. Not surprisingly, Gerard finds trouble brewing! With footage shot in Morocco, this movie also features a beautiful musical score by twotime Oscar nominee Michel Michelet (Voice in the Wind).

programme.title: Born to Battle
programme.desc: Cyclone Tom Saunders starts a ruckus in a Chinese laundry and has to go before a judge. Unable to pay his fine, he is bailed out by a local cattle rancher and agrees to do 30 days work for him. Its not too long before he becomes enmeshed in a war between rustlers and outlaws.

programme.title: Brothers of the West
programme.desc: Tom Tyler plays Tom Wade, a range detective whose brother has been accused of robbery and murder. Wade has only one clue to prove his brothers innocence: a set of unusual tire tracks. This film was directed by Sam Katzman, who later became known as Jungle Sam for his association with a variety of jungle thrillers, and then as a master of all exploitation genres, from teen horror to flying saucer flicks!

programme.title: Fugitive of the Plains
programme.desc: In this continuation of the much loved Billy the Kid serials featuring dreamboat Buster Crabbe (perhaps best known for his numerous appearances as Flash Gordon in the 30s and 40s), Billy finds himself joining an outlaw band led by women in order to, once again, clear his name after being wrongly accused of a crime he did not commit. Helmed by famed B-movie director Sam Newfield, this film also features Al St. John, whose lovable Fuzzy character was as essential to the PRCs Billy the Kid series as Billy himself.

programme.title: Phantom Ranger
programme.desc: Cowboy hero Tim McCoy stars as Tim Hayes, a two-fisted G-Man working for the FBI on a counterfeit money case. The incredibly daring Hayes infiltrates a gang that has kidnapped a Treasury Department engraver. Under the direction of Poverty Row icon Sam Newfield, McCoy turns in another of his legendary slam-bang performances, making Phantom Ranger a perennial favorite of B-Western fans.

programme.title: Neath Canadian Skies
programme.desc: Its the mounties versus claim jumpers in this drama from Golden Gate Pictures. Based on an action-packed novel by James Oliver Curwood and directed by B. Reeves Maynard (Undersea Kingdom, The Phantom Empire), the film features an outstanding cast of Poverty Row regulars, including Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Cliff Nazarro, I. Stanford Jolley, and Kermit Maynard. For movie buffs: Cinematographer Marcel Le Picard began his career in the silent era and finished with exactly 200 credits!

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney take time out from their duties to try and collect the bounty posted on a legendary golden wolf that roams the Colorado foothills. A couple of wolf hunters dont take kindly to a pair of amateur hunters horning in on their range and attempt to drive the G-Men away before they can capture or kill their quarry.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney travel to Wyoming to oversee a land opening and end up playing nursemaid to a pair of identical twin pranksters and a kooky Chinese cook. Meanwhile, a trio of outlaws are pursuing the twins seeking information they possess. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Billie Jo recieves an endowment, but instead of using it for medical school, she wishes to go to Hollywood.Kate meets with Judge Drucker to see if she can legally prevent the girl from goinng. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Visit from a Big Star
programme.desc: A famous movie star (John Vivyan) stays at the Shady Rest Hotel. He wants to get away from the spotlight for a while, but it appears that Uncle Joe has told the entire valley that the hotel has a special guest. .Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Ralph Levy. Episode first aired January 28, 1964

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to uncover a cattle rustling operation.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho investigate when a railway detective is found dead.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a railroad detective who is investigating a railroad holdup. Starring Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Series won an Emmy in 1955. (This episode also features James Best (1926-2015), who would go on to appear on such shows as The Andy Griffith Show, Bonanza, and The Dukes of Hazzard.)

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark discovers the hideout of the famous Doolin gang. Clark, along with Detective Frankie, work to infiltrate the hideout and bring the Doolin gang to justice.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Directed by William Witney. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle, along with Leo Gordon, Joan Shawlee, Don Kennedy, Kenneth MacDoNald, Patrick Waltz, and Ken Chryson. First aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, crooks posing as newspapermen attempt to blackmail a local rancher in order to steal his land and property. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery. In this episode, Judge Bean discovers that a young vagabond he jailed for a minor offense may be involved in a major unsolved gold heist.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the help of Annie and Lofty, Clay Griffin, a lawman whose eyesight is deteriorating, confronts Johnny Storm and the Murdocks after they are involved in a robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: After raising money for charity with a circus sideshow, Annie and Tagg are robbed of their money by a man named the Welshman. Annie and Lofty set up a trap with one last performance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A town turns against Eben Cotten as he is accused of selling rifles to the Indians. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in December, 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: An editor of a newspaper is framed for murder. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in December, 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Gunnar, a long-lost relative of the Cartwright family, arrives in Ponderosa, where the family takes him in for the night. Unknown to the Cartwrights, however, is Gunnars leading of The Comancheros, a dangerous band of criminals. After Little Joe and his girlfriend are kidnapped by The Comancheros, the Cartwrights and Gunnar must work things out.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Under Western Stars
programme.desc: Roy Rogers debuts in his starring role as the likable cowboy sent to Congress with a mission: let Washington know about the suffering of farmers in the wake of Americas 1930s Dustbowl. Enjoy the singing cowboy in his first starring role, rubbing shoulder with politians, going up against greedy executives, and representing a whole people group youll see why Rogers became a national icon! Frog Millhouse: Smiley Burnett. Elanore Fairbanks: Carol Hughes. John Fairbanks: Guy Usher. Plus music and singing from the Maple City Four. (The song Dust was nominated for an Academy Award!) Directed by Joe Kane.

programme.title: Wagon Wheels
programme.desc: Randolph Scott (Ride the High Country) stars as Clint Belmet, the leader of a wagon train on the way to Oregon. Along the route he and his crew deal with various hardships, including Indian attacks and a fellow named Murdock (Monte Blue) who is out to stop them at any cost. With a cast that includes the likes of Gail Patrick and Billy Lee, this adventure saga was based on a novel by the western master, Zane Grey (Riders of the Purple Sage, Fighting Caravans). Trivia note: The films original title was Caravans West.

programme.title: In Old Cheyenne
programme.desc: Roy Rogers plays a newspaper reporter sent to Cheyenne to investigate a reputed troublemaker. While on the scene, he discovers who the real bad guys are, and sets out to right some wrongs. Also starring Roys usual sidekick George Gabby Hayes, plus Joan Woodbury, and George Rosener. This Republic Pictures western was helmed by director Joseph Kane (The Undersea Kingdom, Dakota) and features two musical numbers: Bonita and Linda Flor.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: During the French and Indian War, Alice and Cora Munro are joined by Magua in the search for their father, a British officer. Little do they know, their father is being held captive by the Huron warriors, and Magua intends to betray them. Uncas, the last surviving warrior of the Mohican tribe and Hawkeye set out to rescue the hostages and the sisters before its too late.

programme.title: Northwest Trail
programme.desc: Mountie Matt OBrien assignment is simple: He is to escort the rather grouchy, and slightly annoying, Miss Katherine Owens to a remote outpost. Things complicate however when they arrive at the outpost and he stumbles upon an illegal mining operation. Stars include Bob Steele, Joan Woodbury, and Poodles Hanneford.

programme.title: Winds of the Wasteland
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this Republic Pictures western about the final days of the Pony Express. Former rider John Blair (Wayne) enters a coach race to win a $25,000 government mail contract, but there are dozens of obstacles in his path. The rest of the cast includes Lane Chandler and Phyllis Fraser, plus Lew Kelly (Lady of Burlesque) doing a great comic turn as Rocky OBrien, the eccentric, self-proclaimed mayor of a deserted mining town.

programme.title: The Kansan
programme.desc: Richard Dix stars in this epic of the boisterous and brawling Old West! Wounded in a gun battle with the notorious James gang, John Bonniwell (Dix) wakes up in the hospital to find out hes been elected marshal! He quickly learns that this hot-headed frontier town can only be cooled off with blazing lead and dynamite! Jane Wyatt, Albert Dekker, Victor Jory, and Robert Armstrong also star in this tale of smashing fists and crashing bullets from director George Archainbaud (The Lost Squadron).

programme.title: Daughter of the West
programme.desc: A FLAMING PAGE FROM AMERICAN HISTORY Becomes a powerful motion picture...set against the panoramic grandeur of the West!. Martha Vickers stars as Lolita Moreno, a convent raised woman in the 1880s who learns about her Native American heritage through her relationship with an educated Navajo. Morena had been raised at a California mission, but when she leaves to teach school in Arizona, the threads of her mysterious past are revealed. This leads to her involvement with some dangerous people, and a chance to find love in the most unexpected way. The cast includes Phillip Reed, Donald Woods, William Farnum and Milton Kibbee. Pedro de Cordobaa stars as Chief Wykomas.

programme.sub-title: S2024 : E09 Snapdragon Stadium - San Diego, CA
programme.desc: Son-Uva Digger’s Ryan Anderson looks for back-to-back event championships. Joe Foley attempts to drive El Toro Loco to consecutive freestyle wins and only four points separates the top three as the battle for series points lead heats up.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E12 Raymond James Stadium - Tampa, FL
programme.desc: Former Triple Threat Series Champion Colton Eichelberger returns to Monster Jam looking to lead Max D to another freestyle win, but his old rival Tyler Menninga leads the series and attempts to pilot Grave Digger to another event win. Former Rookie of the Year, Nick Pagliarulo returns to Kraken for his series premiere as Stadium Championship Series East heads to Tampa.

programme.title: Racetrack, Part 16
programme.desc: We present the first three races of the NASCAR Whelen Euro series.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Bentley and the Rolls Royce.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Supercars presents three cars with a combined output of 1779 HP: McLaren MP4-12, Mercedes SLS AMG GT, and Porsche 911 Turbo S. Theres hardly any car that can match their performance, elegance or workmanship.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Supercars takes a look behind the scenes of the final race of the 2013 Blancpain Endurance Series.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: An iconic racing car and one of only 29 ever built! We accompanied the Mercedes 300 SL lightweight on its premiere drive at the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Die-hard Porsche fan Marco Wendlandt makes his dream of driving a 1984 Porsche 911 coupe come true.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Die-hard Porsche fan Marco is on an epic road trip through California. With his newly bought ˜84 Porsche 911 coupe, Marco heads to L.A. to meet one of the best known Porsche enthusiasts of the world.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: On his journey to Las Vegas, Marco drops by Big Mike in the Apple Valley, a remote area in the High Desert of California; together they meet Big Mikes bizarre friends from the Lowdown Kustos family.

programme.title: BMW 503
programme.desc: The noble four-seater 503 convertible was one of BMWs most exclusive models in the 1950s; many international sports and movie stars and other wealthy customers were fond of this sporty luxury vehicle.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Station wagons remain practical vehicles with a lot of space. The Skoda Octavia Scout and the Opel Insignia Country Tourer want to be more than that. A bigger ground clearance, hub caps, underride guard, and a body side.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: A look at some of the most extreme specimens in the offroad world: a Fiat Panda monster truck, a Ford Raptor, a Mercedes G-Class conversion, a modified Volkswagen Touareg, a Jeep Grand Cherokee SRT8 and the Fiat Panda Cross.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Asian car design has evolved over the last years. At Lexus, the luxury vehicle division of Toyota, the current trend is toward angular shapes and aggressive appearance.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Same platform, but three different models: The Skoda Kodiaq provides room for seven people and scores with a favorable entry-level price. The Volkswagen Tiguan is a bit more expensive, but offers a broader range of engines and more technical gadgets.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The Jaguar XF-S is supposed to put pressure on BMW, Audi and co. in the business class segment. With V6 power, 380 HP output and all-wheel drive it wants to teach the German top dogs the true meaning of the word fear.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: By selling and assembling accessories for Jeep, ORZ Vehicles makes the American off-road dream come true for European customers.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: SUVs are still popular and the segment grows steadily. Especially smaller SUVs enter the market. They are perfect for the city, off-road capabilities are less important.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: An escaped prisoner suffers hard labour under Mrs Wicket while Mr Bean puts his feet up in jail.

programme.title: Spring Clean
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds that cleanliness can be a filthy business.

programme.title: The Mole
programme.desc: Mr Bean loses control of a pest and makes a mountain out of a molehill.

programme.title: Bean At The Museum
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks he’s just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden.

programme.title: Hot Date
programme.desc: Romance is in the air and Beans girlfriend is determined to have a piece of it.

programme.title: Super-Trolley
programme.desc: Mr Bean builds a supermarket super trolley.

programme.desc: Mr Bean gets a real bug for painting. Then several bugs… and flies and slugs and mice.

programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan.

programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur.

programme.title: Inventor
programme.desc: A brand new lodger in the house could be a great new friend, or could be your worst enemy.

programme.desc: Mr Bean runs rings around the town.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he can’t.

programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to buy the biggest TV in the world only to find that it has a price-tag to match.

programme.desc: Mr Bean is all at sea with the landed gentry.

programme.desc: Mr Bean takes to the air after being taken for a ride.

programme.desc: Mr Bean meets a soul mate.

programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean orders a takeaway pizza, but when it arrives, he feels let down by the size of it.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey.

programme.desc: Every time Bean goes to collect the newspaper from the letterbox, it disappears.

programme.desc: Mr Bean discovers the great outdoors is not always so great.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean has to buy a cup for Teddy, but he has no money.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town.

programme.desc: Mr Bean takes a trip down Memory Lane.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to buy a cupcake, but his wallet is empty, so he has to visit a cash dispenser.

programme.desc: Mr Bean builds a supermarket super trolley.

programme.desc: Bean’s pursuit of a quiet life ends in a major row.

programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it.

programme.title: Adùnní
programme.desc: Adunni struggles with the weight of a secret she carries, but when she finds out her secret isn’t limited to just her alone, she find the inner strength to seek justice and speak out.

programme.title: Dionee
programme.desc: Paul, a young mechanic, falls in love with an orange-seller, Dionee, and decides to send her to the city and pay for her education. After some time Paul proposes to her but Dionee rejects him, deciding she can do better than an illiterate man.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. In a bid to find love, plus sized Tobi decides to slide into the DM’s of her crush, Mofe, using the picture of her slimmer friend, Sharon. Things get complicated when Mofe wants to meet up with Tobi in person.

programme.title: The Other Side
programme.desc: Mrs Phillip tries to hide her illicit business from her husband, but brings trouble to her doorstep when she unknowingly hires Gina, the niece of her "business associate".

programme.title: The Governors Daughter
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A high-flying woman, Mrs. Helen Onoja, is fixated on making sure her only son, Felix, not only marries from a class as high as hers, but specifically a governor’s daughter. She goes all out to arrange for him to date the spoilt daughter of her childhood friend, whose father happens to be the incumbent governor of Kogi State, ignoring the fact that Felix is in love with another woman, Abike. Meanwhile Felix’s relationship with Abike suffers because he is unable to stand up to his domineering mother.

programme.title: Wild Wild Bayo
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Adeline gets the shock of her life when she is dumped by Kunle without reason. She soon finds out that he has been cheating on her with two other and is getting married to the daughter of a billionaire. She decides to team up with the other women a few days before his wedding to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Jessica Tse
programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits its all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: Love Box
programme.desc: Two long-term unmarried lovers relocate to Lagos for greener pastures and experience relationship with other people before settling down. Their affair relationship becomes threatened as they begin to make new friends and discover new lifestyles.

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: May gets a job as the house-help to a difficult man, Ramsey, and her working situation gets even worse when Ramseys girlfriend believes there is something more than a work relationship between them.

programme.title: AMC Music Moments - Playlist 457
programme.desc: AMC presents music from the latest African artists.

programme.title: Long Shadow
programme.desc: A supposed get together turns into the unraveling of dark secrets, when an intruder comes to stalk, leaving everyone at the edge.

programme.title: Blood and Rope
programme.desc: When 21-year-old Nnadubem becomes fascinated by the dambe traditional Hausa sport of bare- knuckle rope boxing. He has to convert a community of doubters and earn the respect of fellow fighters to be accepted as a warrior.

programme.title: Fashion Insider Season 1 - Reta Riman
programme.desc: Discover new designers, trends, styles, and more at Fashion Insider. Elileojo Achebo provides you with the opportunity to gain firsthand knowledge of the African stylists of the moment.

programme.title: Lockdown
programme.desc: When the federal government imposes a lockdown to control a global pandemic, corona virus plaguing the world, two couples, who have been married for years and thought they knew each other, find that spending so much time together in the confined space of their home may not be a good thing. Hidden secrets will be uncovered, and weaknesses will be known. How will they cope and whose secret is worse?

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Rival twin sisters compete against each other for recognition because one of them has always feel left out and segregated by friends and their family and now she must fight to prove a point that she is important.

programme.title: Learning Love
programme.desc: A career woman goes behind her husbands back in a bid to delay having the children he desperately wants. Can their marriage survive such a betrayal?

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Rival twin sisters compete against each other for recognition because one of them has always feel left out and segregated by friends and their family and now she must fight to prove a point that she is important.

programme.title: The Missing Heirloom
programme.desc: A very expensive family heirloom goes missing and now Detective Lazarus must find it before he loses his own life.

programme.title: Stood Up
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. On the day of her wedding to Patrick, Roselyn receives a message from him telling her that he would not be showing up as he can no longer marry her. Heartbroken, she reluctantly rekindles her relationship with Walter, her ex boyfriend, who she broke up with because of his cult ties. Walter convinces Roselyn he is no longer in a cult, and they soon make plans to marry, however the unexpected happens a night to their wedding.

programme.title: Adùnní
programme.desc: Adunni struggles with the weight of a secret she carries, but when she finds out her secret isn’t limited to just her alone, she find the inner strength to seek justice and speak out.

programme.title: Becoming Mrs Eze
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When Tatiana accepts Ezes marriage proposal, her friends and family believe she has chosen wrong due to the fact that he is considered unrefined and broke, and Ezes family believe that Tatiana is a city girl that is not good enough for him. Will Tatiana and Ezes love be strong enough to withstand all the judgement?

programme.title: Cat And Dog
programme.desc: A pair of young tenants are constantly at odds with their landlord due to unpaid rent. She decides to make their living arrangement very uncomfortable for them.

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge S6 - Adam Srae
programme.desc: AMC brings you legendary and undiscovered artists as they discuss all things music and beyond. Stay tuned for intimate interviews and live music performances.

programme.title: The Fourth Party
programme.desc: Sophie Williams, the pregnant daughter of a billionaire chief, is on the verge of being duped and killed in exchange for all her inheritance after trusting the wrong people.

programme.title: Something Strange
programme.desc: Dami and Shalewa’s lives are turned upside down when birthday celebrations turn into a nightmare and Shalewa is assaulted. Dami is pointed as the obvious culprit due to his constant pursuit of Shalewa but are there other people being overlooked?

programme.title: Recall
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Dave develops amnesia after getting into a car accident with his wife, Cindy. He does not remember his wife at all and only recalls his time with his ex-girlfriend, Stella. As Cindy battles to get Dave to recognise her again, Stella manipulates Dave and worms her way back into his life.

programme.title: The Hangout S4 - EP4
programme.desc: A group of opinionated, social media-savvy millennials debate controversial topics on love, sex, friendship, and more.

programme.title: Burning Pain
programme.desc: After his wife becomes sick and unable to move properly, Michael takes on the extra responsibility of caring for her. Is he doing this out of the goodness of his heart or is there something nefarious going on behind close doors?

programme.title: Freda
programme.desc: Tobi is completely in love with his fiercely very rich and successful girlfriend, Freda. He does everything to make her happy but she doesnt seem satisfied with anything he does. When she says yes after his public marriage proposal, he believes everything in their life is perfect, but things start to spiral out of control.

programme.title: Daybreak
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A typical heartbreaker and playboy wakes up to find out that his manhood has disappeared. He consults a prophet and finds out the curse has been put on him by one of the women he has angered and he has 24 hours to seek forgiveness from the one who has cursed him. The problem is, he doesnt know who the culprit is amongst all the women he has angered.

programme.title: The Governors Daughter
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A high-flying woman, Mrs. Helen Onoja, is fixated on making sure her only son, Felix, not only marries from a class as high as hers, but specifically a governor’s daughter. She goes all out to arrange for him to date the spoilt daughter of her childhood friend, whose father happens to be the incumbent governor of Kogi State, ignoring the fact that Felix is in love with another woman, Abike. Meanwhile Felix’s relationship with Abike suffers because he is unable to stand up to his domineering mother.

programme.title: Who Forgot The Words?!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Who Forgot The Words?!
programme.desc: Hit songs with few words - the 70s was full of them! From Elton John and Mike Oldfield to long forgotten acts like Hot Butter and Focus. And yes - there are some bagpipes!

programme.title: 70s v 80s Mixtape!
programme.desc: 60 hit songs, 30 top artists - one track as they were in the 70s, and another in the 80s - simple! From Abba to Slade, Kate Bush to Blondie and Billy Joel to Billy Ocean.

programme.title: We Will Rock You!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 We Will Rock You!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock and guitar anthems! A classic decade for Queen, Status Quo, Led Zepp, Black Sabbath, The Stones and Thin Lizzy.

programme.title: Pat Sharps Stage and Silver Screen!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharps Stage and Silver Screen!
programme.desc: 25 singalongs made famous in the theatre, on TV and at the movies. Expect The Partridge Family, Evita and Watership Down, plus a good dollop of Bond, Grease and Saturday Night Fever!

programme.title: Far Out, Man!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men and leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground and the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: NOW 70s presents NOW 60s!
programme.desc: 2 hours of flashbacks from the swinging 60s! Including Johnny Cash, Sam Cooke, The Kinks, The Beach Boys, Martha Reeves, Bob Dylan, The Rolling Stones and Elvis.

programme.title: Tony Blackburns 70s Glam Pop!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Tony Blackburns 70s Glam Pop!
programme.desc: Big singalong choruses and outrageous outfits and make-up - these were the guys and gals that set the style of the 70s - and our man with the musical plan Tony Blackburn was there!

programme.title: 70s Glam Slam!
programme.desc: Rewind to a time of big hair, outrageous makeup and platform shoes. The greatest gems of glam pop and rock, including Queen, Abba and Wizzard.

programme.title: Hellraisers! Sweet vs Slade
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Hellraisers! Sweet vs Slade

programme.desc: Party pop rock anthems spanning 5 decades! From Queen, Kiss and Aerosmith to Blur, Paramore and The White Stripes.

programme.title: Carol Deckers Leather and Lace!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Carol Deckers Leather and Lace!
programme.desc: 25 years of classic rock from an era where the look was nearly as important as the music! From Led Zeppelin in 1970 to Def Leppard in 1995.

programme.title: Rated Rock! The No.1s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Rated Rock! The No.1s
programme.desc: Number 1 rock songs from the last 50 years! With mega hits from the Arctic Monkeys and KOL right back to legends like The Stones and T.Rex!

programme.title: Rock Top 3s: 2000-2009
programme.desc: in order, the rock anthems that claimed the top 3 in the first decade of this century. From Limp Bizkit in 2000 to Kasabian in 2009!

programme.title: Killer Cuts Of The 00s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Killer Cuts Of The 00s!
programme.desc: A decade of mega hits and the loudest anthems! Expect Biffy Clyro, Linkin Park, Blink 182, Evanescence, Fall Out Boy and loads more!

programme.title: Muse: Fan Favourites
programme.desc: From 2003 to 2015 - 30 minutes of the biggest rock songs from Muse!

programme.title: Weekend Anthems!
programme.desc: Turn it up to 11 all weekend for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro and The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!

programme.title: Alex Bakers 50 Rock Party Bangers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Alex Bakers 50 Rock Party Bangers
programme.desc: Alex Baker brings you the best, most sing-a-longable, rock party bangers of all time. If you love Green Day, The Foo Fighters, Bon Jovi and BMTH, then you are in for a treat!

programme.title: Turn Up The 00s Anthems!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Turn Up The 00s Anthems!
programme.desc: Turn up your spreakers to 11 and live life even louder! 50 All-Killer Anthems in order from Blink 182 in 2000 to The Killers at the end of the Decade!

programme.title: Weekend Anthems!
programme.desc: Turn it up to 11 all weekend for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro and The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!

programme.title: Smurffit
programme.desc: Suursmurffin kasvujuomaa roiskuu vahingossa rayhalinnun paalle, minka tuloksena lintu kasvaa jattimaiseksi. Pitkallisen harkinnan jalkeen Suursmurffi kayttaa kutistusainetta lintuun, ja pian elama Smurffikylassa palaa jalleen normaaliin paivajarjestykseen.

programme.title: Smurffit
programme.desc: Kun Suursmurffin vanha ystava Palador varoittaa lahestyvasta vaarasta, smurffit kaivavat esiin salaperaisen apuvalineen, aikakapselin.

programme.title: Pingu
